About.title: About
About.desc: I'm a graduate student in Computer Engineering and passionate about Web Development with a focus on the JavaScript ecosystem (ReactJs,React-Native, NodeJs). I aspire to get a job in the world of Web Development, gain experience, new knowledge and strengthen my professional life. I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, assertive communication, problem solving, responsible and proactive, I like to learn from others and continuously improve myself.
